name: Ishido: The Way of Stones
overview: From Stonehenge to the Great Pyramids...From the earliest North Americans to the ancient civilizations of the Far East...The stones of ISHIDO have spanned continents and cultures for eons of time to arrive here in your hands, drawing you into their spell of endless fascination. The object of ISHIDO is to place as many stones as possible onto the game board in combinations that maximize your score. Easy to learn, and yet challenging, for players of all ages, ISHIDO combines the elements of skill, strategy and luck in a game that will captivate you for countless hours...As it has captivated others for centuries.
